body:
We need to make sure entire src folder is added to package.json, so npm global commands continue to work.

We also need to make sure basic checks we do for .mjs scripts commands are also executed using global installation from local folder (so we test hive/solve commands the same way we already test hive.mjs and solve.mjs scripts).
title: Move hive.mjs and solve.mjs and all their dependencies .mjs into src folder from the root of repository
